issue.title: [Java] Add code coverage support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13859](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13859). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's currently no easy way to check code coverage for the Java codebase. Ideally a profile should be added to enable code coverage reporting with a tool like Jacoco
